text: Samile Bermannelli (born 22 May 1998) is a Brazilian fashion model. ==Early life and career== Bermannelli was born in Salvador, Bahia and was discovered by entering a local modeling contest. She has walked the runway for Prabal Gurung, Marchesa, Brandon Maxwell, Hermès, Dolce & Gabbana, Marc Jacobs, Trussardi, Alberta Ferretti, Valentino, Off-White, Kenzo, Nina Ricci, Mugler, Ralph Lauren, Balmain, Tommy Hilfiger, Salvatore Ferragamo, Viktor & Rolf, Fendi, H&M;, and Miu Miu. She has appeared in Vogue, Vogue Brasil, and Vogue Japan. Bermannelli walked in the 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Shanghai, China. In 2017, Models.com listed her as a ″Top Newcomer.″ == References == Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Salvador, Bahia Category:Brazilian female models Category:African- Brazilian female models
title: Samile Bermannelli
